biography: Milena Vukotić is a former ballerina and a stage, television, and film actress. She was born in Rome, to a Montenegrin comediographer father and an Italian pianist/composer mother. She is known for her role of Pina in the Fantozzi series of comedy films. Additional screen credits include Arabella, The Adventurers, Blood for Dracula, The Phantom of Liberty, Monsignor, Juliet of the Spirits and A Good Woman. She had a recurring role on the French television series Une famille formidable.
name: Milena Vukotić
